comments.body: for tech companies dsa ,os , dbms are most important..but for core companies good theoretical knowledge including basics should be clear .(leetcode(easy-medium type (look for top interview questions in the leetcode website and try solving easy questions and medium questions ) and hackerank for dsa,geeks for geeks excellent source for os related interview questions and past interview experiences , dbms from interview bit , geeks for geeks.)If u need help feel free to dm..cheers!
